chapter.title: Change History
chapter.para: This change history is a high level summary of selected changes that may impact applications and/or break backwards compatibility.
See also the CHANGES file in the source distribution for a complete list of changes.

section.title: PECL/mysqlnd_mux 1.0 series
section.para:
1.0.0-pre-alpha
Release date: no package released, initial check-in 09/2012
Motto/theme: Proof of concept
Initial check-in. Essentially a demo of the mysqlnd plugin API.

note.para: This is the current development series. All features are at an early stage. Changes may happen at any time without prior notice. Please, do not use this version in production environments.
The documentation may not reflect all changes yet.
